name: Testimonial Slider
author: Inbox Technology

sections.description:
This plugin is used to create sliding testimonial. You can add name,image,description,category,Main Box Background Color,Testimonial Section Heading,All Text Color,Client Content Box Color and tag. just use the short code in required section and it will work fine.developed on bootstrap and its mobile responsive.

Features

Fully Responsive
1 layouts 
Slider control
Widget Supported 
Testimonial Heading
Main Box Background Color
All Text Color
Client Content Box Color
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/Testimonial-Slider directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. You see the admin menu option name “Testimonials”.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Add Testimonial Main Heading
  • Add background Color
  • Add Text color
  • Add Client Content Box color

1.0

  • A change since the previous version.
  • Another change.

short_description: Testimonial slider is very helpful to display client feeback and quote. You can create shortcode and use it. thats simple. It is mobile friednly.
